question: Which bank has launched National Common Mobility Debit Card, with special features like ‘tap and go’ and ‘offline wallet’?
explanation:
Mangaluru-based Karnataka Bank has launched National Common Mobility Debit Card, with special features like ‘tap and go’ and ‘offline wallet’ payments.
It is a Rupay card and a contactless debit-cum-prepaid and interoperable transport card. As per the bank, users can make payments without inserting the card at PoS terminals.
